title: Japanese Seasoning Face Test
subtitle: Which seasoning face are you?
description: Upload your photo and discover which Japanese seasoning your face resembles!

privacy.notice: Images are not stored on the server
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your images are only processed in your browser and are never sent to the server.

imageHandling.title: Image Handling
imageHandling.content: All uploaded images in this service are processed only within your browser and are never sent to the server. Image data is stored only in the browser's memory and is completely deleted when you close the page.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: This service stores information such as language settings in your browser's local storage to improve user experience. This information does not identify individuals.

analytics.title: Access Analytics
analytics.content: This service uses Google Analytics to perform access analysis. The data collected is used for service improvement and does not include personally identifiable information.

advertising.title: About Advertising
advertising.content: This service displays advertisements through Google AdSense. Advertising distributors may use cookies to deliver interest-based ads.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For inquiries regarding this privacy policy, please contact the service administrator.

error.title: An error occurred
error.noFace: No face detected. Please try another photo.
error.multipleFaces: Multiple faces detected. Please use a photo with one person.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

desc.soy_sauce:
A soy sauce type with a clean, Japanese-style face without quirks.

【Facial Features】
Deeper facial features than salt type, with a clean Japanese-style face. Restrained eyes that aren't too dark, a well-balanced nose that extends straight, small lips, and an overall calm face with well-balanced fair skin.

【Personality】
A calm impression with a versatile personality that values harmony in any situation. Gets along well with various people and inspires trust. A presence that becomes more attractive over time, combining Japanese warmth and stability.
desc.miso:
A miso type with darker facial features and overall distinct facial structure compared to fair-skinned, clean salt or soy sauce types.

【Facial Features】
Deep features with round double eyelids, thick tear bags, strong eye power, high and sharp nose, large mouth, and long eyelashes. The facial features are strong but maintain Japanese characteristics.

【Personality】
You have exceptional embracing qualities that make those around you feel comfortable. With your multifaceted charm, you show various aspects while providing people with stability and warmth. You're a reliable character who becomes a solid support even in difficult situations.
desc.salt:
A salt type with a clean, thin facial structure that gives a refreshing impression.

【Facial Features】
Shallow facial features with overall light elements. Sharp with single or deep double eyelids, a straight and high nose, thin lips, slender build with fair skin, and clean facial lines. Also carries an intellectual and cool image.

【Personality】
You have the power to see through to the essence and give a clean, tidy impression. Excellent at removing unnecessary things and focusing on the core, you have a pure and honest character. An essential presence that exerts great influence with just a small amount.
desc.sugar:
A sugar type referring to sweet baby-faced people.

【Facial Features】
Round and clear eyes, a well-shaped nose that's not too high, pink lips with a soft image, fair skin with a small face, and rounded facial features. Like the seasoning sugar, all features are full of sweetness.

【Personality】
You have a natural charm that attracts people and brightens your surroundings with positive energy. You have the power to bring out the best in others and shine more when with people. A person who creates a pure and lovely atmosphere.
desc.vinegar:
A vinegar type with a cleaner, fresher facial structure than salt, combining a light face with beauty.

【Facial Features】
Single or deep double eyelids that are long, a high and beautiful nose, thin lips, slightly sunken cheeks with a slender build. Among seasonings, it's particularly clean and beautiful.

【Personality】
You have a unique personality and provide fresh perspectives and ideas. Sometimes sharp, but that becomes your charm, and you have the ability to refresh situations. A challenging character who doesn't fear change and enjoys new attempts.
desc.sauce:
A sauce type with distinct facial features and deep features, representing strong people.

【Facial Features】
Each facial feature is strong, with a foreign male-like facial structure. Double eyelids with large eyes, a straight and high nose, large mouth, distinct outline with thick eyebrows. Also possesses sex appeal and wildness.

【Personality】
Your presence stands out and you naturally demonstrate leadership. With your complex and deep personality, you leave an unforgettable impression once met. A passionate and progressive character with the drive to move strongly toward goals.
desc.mayo:
A mayonnaise type that's smooth but with a slight sourness, combining adult masculinity with childlike qualities and subtle sex appeal.

【Facial Features】
Double eyelids that are slightly droopy, a well-balanced beautiful nose, small and elegant lips, a cute facial structure with fair skin. An impression that combines richness with beauty.

【Personality】
Excellent in flexibility, you harmonize well with anyone and have outstanding ability to create balance. With your gentle nature, you ease conflicts and play a role connecting people. Delicate and deeply considerate, providing comfort to those around you.
desc.ketchup:
A ketchup type that's darker than soy sauce but less intense than sauce type.

【Facial Features】
A sharp, cool facial structure with a face that's neither too dark nor too light, with added sweetness for good balance. Large and clear eyes, a straight and clean nose, lips that are neither too thin nor too thick, creating a sharp face that combines sweetness and intensity.

【Personality】
You have the power to make your surroundings enjoyable with vibrant energy. Sociable and friendly, loved by everyone, you play the role of mood maker. You have the charm to brighten difficult situations with a positive and optimistic attitude.
desc.olive:
A distinctive olive oil type that stands out from typical Japanese features.

【Facial Features】
Deep facial features with large, almond-shaped eyes, well-groomed eyebrows, and healthy wheat-colored skin. Your face has an oily yet fresh quality that gives off a distinctly non-Japanese, eye-catching atmosphere.

【Personality】
You possess a complex charm that combines seductive, devilish elements with a refreshing, clean aura. Strong international orientation with many people active in modeling and entertainment, you have a presence that stands out even in groups.
desc.soy_sauce_female:
A soy sauce type with an elegant, Japanese-style face.

【Facial Features】
Deeper facial features than salt type, with an elegant Japanese-style face. Refined and elegant eyes that aren't too dark, a well-balanced nose that extends cleanly, small lips, and an overall calm impression with elegant fair skin.

【Personality】
An elegant and calm impression with feminine charm that values harmony in any situation. Gets along well with various people and inspires trust. A presence that becomes more attractive over time, combining Japanese feminine warmth and stability.
desc.miso_female:
A miso type with darker facial features and overall distinct facial structure compared to fair-skinned, elegant salt or soy sauce types.

purpose.title: Service Purpose
purpose.content: This service is a face diagnostic service provided for entertainment purposes. Diagnosis results are estimates by machine learning models and are not based on scientific or medical evidence.

rules.title: Usage Rules
items: This service is provided free of charge
Accuracy of diagnosis results is not guaranteed
This service may be changed or terminated without notice
The operator is not responsible for any damage caused by the use of the service

prohibited.title: Prohibited Actions
items: Using other people's photos without permission
Acts that interfere with service operation
Acts that violate laws and regulations
Acts contrary to public order and morals

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content: Copyright of the service content (illustrations, text, etc.) belongs to the operator. Personal sharing of diagnosis results is permitted, but commercial use and unauthorized reproduction are prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This service is provided 'as is,' and the operator makes no warranties regarding the completeness, accuracy, or usefulness of the service. Users use this service at their own risk.

intro.title: What is Japanese Seasoning Face Test?
intro.description: Japanese Seasoning Face Test is a fun service that uses AI technology to analyze which Japanese seasoning your face resembles. Find your type among 9 seasoning types: Soy Sauce, Miso, Salt, Sugar, Vinegar, Sauce, Mayonnaise, Ketchup, and Olive Oil!

features.title: Service Features
items: Precise analysis using AI machine learning technology
Processed instantly in your browser with no privacy concerns
Share on SNS and enjoy with friends

steps.title: Select Gender
steps.description: Choose your gender for more accurate analysis.

steps.title: Upload Photo
steps.description: Take a photo directly with your camera or select from your gallery. A front-facing photo with your face clearly visible works best.

steps.title: AI Analysis
steps.description: AI automatically analyzes your uploaded photo. Just wait a few seconds!

steps.title: View & Share Results
steps.description: Check your seasoning type and share it with friends on social media!

seasoningTypes.title: 9 Seasoning Types
seasoningTypes.description: Each seasoning represents unique facial features and personality traits.
seasoningTypes.soy_sauce: Balanced and deep soy sauce type
seasoningTypes.olive: Sophisticated and elegant olive oil type

items.question: Are my photos stored on the server?
items.answer: No! All image processing happens only within your browser and is never sent to or stored on the server. Everything is completely deleted when you close the page.

items.question: What kind of photo should I use?
items.answer: A photo where your face is clearly visible from the front, taken in good lighting works best. We recommend photos without sunglasses or masks.

items.question: Are the results accurate?
items.answer: This test is a fun entertainment tool. While it uses AI models, it's not based on scientific or medical evidence.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: Yes! It's completely free to use. No registration or login required.

items.question: Can I use it on mobile?
items.answer: Absolutely! It works on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and PCs.

items.title: Fun Self-Discovery
items.description: Discover yourself in a new way through familiar seasonings.

items.title: Conversation Starter
items.description: Compare results with friends and family for enjoyable conversations.

items.title: SNS Viral Content
items.description: Share your unique and fun results on social media to create buzz.
